CustomField.formula: IF(HOUR(Exhibit_Hours_Close_Day_2__c) = 0, TEXT(12), IF(AND(HOUR(Exhibit_Hours_Close_Day_2__c) > 0, HOUR(Exhibit_Hours_Close_Day_2__c) <= 12), TEXT(HOUR(Exhibit_Hours_Close_Day_2__c)), TEXT(HOUR(Exhibit_Hours_Close_Day_2__c) - 12))) + IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Exhibit_Hours_Close_Day_2__c)), ":" + LPAD(TEXT(MINUTE(Exhibit_Hours_Close_Day_2__c)), 2, '0') + " " + IF(HOUR(Exhibit_Hours_Close_Day_2__c) < 12, "AM", "PM"),"")
CustomField.label: Exhibit Hours Close-Day2
